attributes.action: look at the issuing of mobility cars to people who have very little wrong with them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mobility cars cost in the region of £10000-16000 each, and in my area I have a lot of them.  The people in them hold down manual jobs,not a lot wrong with them,  or are income support scroungers, just plain lazy.
As always there are genuine people, and that should be assessed, but if you think how many of these cars are about it must be costing US, yes US a fortune in taxes. It also seems every person when they reach 65 think they are entitled to one, as a FREE gift, they get free tax, insurance, tyres exhausts, all they have to put in is petrol.
